Title: Ghost Fly
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Graham Falk, Cole Sanchez, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: John DiMaggio, Melinda Hill, Steve Little, Jeremy Shada
Plot: Jake kills a fly that gets into his soup. However, he and Finn must get creative when the fly returns as a powerful ghost to haunt them.
